Chapter 3028: Chapter 1569: Holding The Pearl Of Wisdom Secures The Winning Move, A Card Of The Divine Beats The Invincible_2

Chapter 3028: Chapter 1569: Holding the Pearl of Wisdom Secures the Winning Move, a Card of The Divine Beats the Invincible_2

“You cut your soul because you scared me,” Xu Xiaoshou ignored the struggling soul body of the Four Saints.

“You were scared by me, but at the end of the day, it’s because you’re cowardly,” Da Qiongcang shook his head, “Besides, that wasn’t a scare, it was just a joke.”

“I’m not the kind of person who jokes, as you know.”

“That’s convenient, I am…” Da Qiongcang smiled warmly across the way, “I love to joke the most.”

You motherf*cker!

Xu Xiaoshou was steaming with rage, finding verbal argument insufficient, so he directly chose to take action.

He flipped out an image recording bead with a swish, and with lightning speed, captured the scene of “Four Saints bowing to the Path, Path Principles revealed.”

“Kill them all!”

After swallowing the image recording bead to prevent any possibility of it being stolen, Xu Xiaoshou jutted his chin and declared, “When I return to Shengshen Continent, I will help propagate your achievements, Da Qiongcang, like…”

“Enough!”

Da Qiongcang twitched at the corner of his mouth, gesturing with his hand to stop, not wanting to hear the nonsense Xu Xiaoshou was about to say.

He could already foresee that kind of scenario.

But Xu Xiaoshou was clearly not the kind to be suppressed by others, and stubbornly continued:

“Like, what’s that… even if my spirit is destroyed and my physique left uncovered, I, Da Qiongcang, can still enter the game, triumph over demi-gods, and using non-sense, cause the downfall and destruction of the Four Saints’ souls.”

Even Da Qiongcang, with his great composure, couldn’t help twitching in his mind upon hearing that, nearly truly asking, “What the hell is ‘non-sense’ supposed to be?”

His face darkened, then shifted to thinking that at this moment, Xu Xiaoshou should be putting on a silly smile and cunningly presenting an enlarged painting, maybe even increasing the resolution and detailed depiction.

—This is it!

Okay, okay…

My reputation of thirty years, ruined in one single night by you, is that it?

But do you really think you can control me this way?

Da Qiongcang gave a cold laugh: “Not to mention who would believe you, just the fact you need to pull out that image recording bead, they four won’t agree.”

The background boards, controlled in an instant, including two Upanishad demi-saints.

These are your seniors, will they let you mess around and ruin their reputation?

Da Qiongcang was confident of victory.

So you’ve revealed it then, you don’t actually want to kill them, just want to use this incident as a bargaining chip before negotiating… Xu Xiaoshou casually pursed his lips in response.

“Here.”

He flipped his left hand, revealing a gigantic portrait, where one could barely make out the face, only the golden beast mask not fully erased exposed the exhibitionist.

This guy had stripped off his lower garments, revealing in the water a sexy pink and purple striped pair of underwear.

“Here.”

Xu Xiaoshou poked with his right hand, revealing another giant portrait.

There, a bald head with only a few strands of hair on the top visible, facial features slightly blurred, leaving only big dark circles, and the billowing Infernal White Flame at his feet not well erased.

Hovering above his head in horror were a few large characters…

Who says text can’t convey sound? Da Qiongcang distinctly heard Sleeveless’s terrified, trembling voice:

“Xiaoshou save me!!!”

And faintly, a calm and savior-like reply from Sangzi:

“Sangzi, don’t be afraid, your teacher will save you!”

At this moment, Da Qiongcang fell silent.

You Saint Servants, playing so dirty…

“Hehe.”

Da Qiongcang suddenly forced a smile, said apologetically: “Xu Xiaoshou, you know, I actually don’t like to joke that much.”

“How quaint.”

Xu Xiaoshou tossed his hands to the sides, retracting the large portraits, and raised an eyebrow, “I, have already become a person who loves to joke.”

“Glared At, Passive Points, +1.”

“Disliked, Passive Points, +1.”

“Cursed, Passive Points, +1.”

Taking several deep breaths, Da Qiongcang restoring calm, returned the soul bodies of the Four Saints to their respective physiques.

Boom, Boom, Boom, Boom!

In an instant, the earth burst open with four blasts, dust flying everywhere.

Xu Xiaoshou looked up to see the Four Demi-Saints, each already a hundred miles away, manipulating their own physiques, cautiously on alert.

The Cutting Path physique of Da Qiongcang flopped to the ground with a plop.

The naked Da Qiongcang himself, meanwhile, rolled his eyes, regaining consciousness.

He raised his hands, his white robe lifting with the wind, gently slipping back on.

While fastening his belt, the black marks on his hands, feet, and neck quickly faded.

Before long, when the Long-haired Da Qiongcang lifted his head with a smiling face, he had regained his elegant and graceful appearance.

Looking around, Da Qiongcang flicked his sleeve robe up his wrist, chuckled and said:

“Was there really a need to retreat that far?”

“Folks, after so many encounters, this time, how about making friends?”

Who wants to be friends with you?

Whether it’s Elder Sang of Fen Qin, managing the schemes of Abyss Island’s Water Ghost.

Or the well-known Cen Qiaofu, who had not yet directly clashed, and the Palace Master Bai Zhou of Xu Yue Grey Palace, who could not travel openly under the pressure of the Holy Divine Palace…

Da Qiongcang was aware.

They each hid in their own shadows, not wanting to, and impossible to, be friends with this hypocrite!

Differences in path, do not seek common ground.

This, is the best interpretation of the current situation.

But this time, while Da Qiongcang’s words seemed to be addressing the four, his eyes didn’t move an inch, staring at Xu Xiaoshou from start to finish.

Swish, swish, swish, swish!

In just a moment, the Four Demi-Saints, after briefly recovering from their near soul-snatching ordeal, gathered around Xu Xiaoshou once again.
